issue.title: drc practice task 7 - wheel valve large mode rotates slowly on spawn

content.raw:
seems to be a problem with `<use_parent_model_frame>`.

The inertia has a [y-axis offset](#!/osrf/gazebo_models/src/c537247b0ceec181040d806b45eb13b11c401552/drc_practice_wheel_valve_large/model.sdf?at=default#cl-8), it seems that setting the [<use_parent_model_frame> flag to true](#!/osrf/gazebo_models/src/c537247b0ceec181040d806b45eb13b11c401552/drc_practice_wheel_valve_large/model.sdf?at=default#cl-96) causes the joint axis to misalign with the CG location, and cause the valve wheel to rotate slowly counter-clock-wise.  This effect can be reversed and exaggerated by [setting approximate PI/2 rotation](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/src/9a27d2867ab572e5fe698ddd731b9261f38b2dac/drcsim_model_resources/worlds/drc_practice_task_7.world?at=default#cl-58) from `3.1415` to `3.142`.

Setting the [<use_parent_model_frame> flag](#!/osrf/gazebo_models/src/c537247b0ceec181040d806b45eb13b11c401552/drc_practice_wheel_valve_large/model.sdf?at=default#cl-96) to false resolves this issue.
content.html:
seems to be a problem with <use_parent_model_frame>.

The inertia has a y-axis offset, it seems that setting the <use_parent_model_frame> flag to true causes the joint axis to misalign with the CG location, and cause the valve wheel to rotate slowly counter-clock-wise. This effect can be reversed and exaggerated by setting approximate PI/2 rotation from 3.1415 to 3.142.

Setting the <use_parent_model_frame> flag to false resolves this issue.
